body_html: i was able to build on my local machine for now. going to try again with docker later, but i think the issue was my host machine configuration. for some reason the docker container is not permitted or cannot access the nvidia drivers.

body: i was able to build on my local machine for now.  going to try again with docker later, but i think the issue was my host machine configuration.  for some reason the docker container is not permitted or cannot access the nvidia drivers.
